attributes.action: To force the Government to get help for all Morgellons's Sufferers
attributes.additional_details: For more information to understand this go to research Morgellons via Google and view many of the You Tube videos to help understand this discease
attributes.background:
Morgellons is a poorly understood condition which physicians in the USA believe to be a chronic infectious disease. It can be both disabling and disfiguring. 
There are 1000’s of sufferers in the UK , but unlike the USA the medical profession will not recognise as such and say it’s delusional.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it seems to be asking for action to be taken across the UK. We can only accept petitions that call for action from the UK Government. The UK Government is only responsible for health policy in England. You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action, if you would like health policy to be changed in England.
